I've developed a new chipset that allows machines to keep track of their location.
After I analyzed how compasses work, I managed to recreate it in a more compact, electronic form.
A higher quality transportation chipset (high chip power) bears no advantage over a regular one!
Info: The actual effect of this chipset will be determined by the machine in which this chip is placed.
Hint: Refer to "Logic Chipset" for general information on chipsets.
